name: Tree Shape
flavorText: You assume the form of a tree, blending into the forest around you.
text: You transform into a Large tree or shrub. While you are in this state, you perceive everything around you as normal. You retain all of your statistics, though you cannot use powers or perform rituals. All your clothing and gear transforms along with you. The ritual ends and you revert to your normal form if you take any damage or take an action, or at the end of the ritualâ€™s duration.
